channel.title: Projects on Jorge Sánchez
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jorge Sánchez

item.title: Gold Diggers
item.description: This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2021. It was my first game jam ever, i had a lot of fun. The theme of 2021 was “Lost & Found”. After hours of not knowing what game to make we decided to make the game about pirates and it naturally became a “find the treasure” game, borrowing ideas from minesweeper. You can play it here: Play! Images
